title: SUPERVIVE Tier List
description: Conquer the battleground with this comprehensive SUPERVIVE tier list. Discover the top-tier characters, their strengths, and strategies to dominate the arena.
heading: SUPERVIVE Tier List
introText: Conquer the battleground with this comprehensive SUPERVIVE tier list. Discover the top-tier characters, their strengths, and strategies to dominate the arena.

data.itemDescription: Shiv is a melee fighter who specializes in close-quarters combat. His abilities grant him increased attack speed, movement speed, and damage output, making him a threat in melee engagements

Felix is a ranged damage dealer who excels at dealing consistent damage from a distance. His abilities allow him to slow enemies, apply area-of-effect damage, and attack multiple targets simultaneously
Brall is a melee fighter who focuses on dealing burst damage. His abilities grant him increased movement speed and attack damage, but he lacks the sustain and versatility of other melee characters
Oath is a tank character who can provide damage mitigation and crowd control. His abilities enable him to stun enemies, reduce incoming damage, and deal area-of-effect damage
Celeste is a ranged damage dealer who specializes in dealing high damage over time. Her abilities allow her to apply debuffs, summon damaging projectiles, and deal area-of-effect damage
Zeph is a ranged damage dealer who specializes in dealing damage over time. His abilities allow him to spread debuffs, summon damaging projectiles, and deal area-of-effect damage
Joule is a support character who provides healing and buffs to her teammates. Her abilities enable her to sustain allies, enhance their damage, and protect them from harm
Kingpin is a tanky character who can absorb substantial damage and protect his allies. His abilities provide crowd control, damage mitigation, and area-of-effect damage
Bishop is a support character who can control the battlefield and manipulate enemy positions. His abilities enable him to teleport allies, create barriers, and deal damage to nearby opponents
Myth is an exceptional character who excels in both offense and defense. His abilities allow him to control the battlefield, deal significant damage, and protect his teammates
Void is a support character who can disrupt enemies and provide minor healing to allies. His abilities enable him to silence enemies, slow their movement, and heal nearby teammates

Elluna is a ranged damage dealer who excels at dealing damage to single targets. Her abilities allow her to mark enemies, deal bonus damage to marked targets, and execute them under certain conditions
Ghost is a highly mobile assassin capable of eliminating opponents quickly and efficiently. His invisibility and teleporting skills make him a formidable adversary
Shriek is a versatile character who can adapt to various situations. Her abilities enable her to deal sustained damage, disrupt enemies, and heal herself
